titles.title: Fair Housing Tax Credit Extension Act of 2009
Fair Housing Tax Credit Extension Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the first-time homebuyer credit retroactive to the beginning of 2008 and to permanently extend the credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Fair Housing Tax Credit Extension Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make the first-time homebuyer tax credit applicable to purchases of a principal residence after December 31, 2007; and (2) make such credit permanent.
